dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Mewayz
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
Mewayz
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
Mewayz needs camera access to capture photos for your posts and content.
Mewayz needs photo library access to select images for your posts and content.
Mewayz needs microphone access to record audio for your content.
Mewayz needs location access to provide location-based features and analytics.
Mewayz needs contacts access to help you connect with your network and import contacts to your CRM.
Mewayz needs calendar access to help you schedule posts and manage your content calendar.
Mewayz needs access to your music library to add background music to your video content.
Mewayz may use Bluetooth to connect with compatible devices for content creation.
Mewayz uses Face ID for secure authentication and protecting your account.
Mewayz would like to track your activity to provide personalized analytics and improve your experience.
